messages.msgSnippet: That would be Lucius (sp?) Malfoy in HP or the same actor as the really curel Dragoon in The Patriot, nasty guy (he burned a church full of people down) but
messages.messageBody:
That would be Lucius (sp?) Malfoy in HP or the same actor as the really
curel Dragoon in The Patriot, nasty guy (he burned a church full of
people down) but way sexy.
Julie W in AR

messages.msgSnippet: I would even venture to say Snape,        OK,  I ll duck now,  don t kill me Shyrley! I think its the voice and presence ,  looks often disappear when the
messages.messageBody:
I would even venture to say Snape, OK, I'll duck now, don't kill me Shyrley!<g>

I think its the voice and presence , looks often disappear when the sex appeal and personality are strong.

Kelli

Ren
